Title: System independent  Regedit control
HomeWiki:
System independent Regedit control is a .NET Control fror editing "RAW" Registry.dat files.
This Project is based on the ntreg.c lib, "ugly" portet from linx. I created the regedit projekt for a tool on my blog:

http://www.software-virtualisierung.de

The original ntreg.c can be found here:
http://pogostick.net/~pnh/ntpasswd/editor.html

Licenced under "GNU Lesser General Public License"

This is a RAW editor. Better to use the real regedit for your Windows registry! Hives (areas) can be easily destroyed.
